attributes.action: Request a public national inquiry into the rape gang epidemic across the UK
attributes.additional_details:
For decades the news of rape gangs across the UK has been suppressed by our mainstream media and political parties of all colours.

This issue is above politics, it’s about finding justice for those victims, some of whom are not alive today because of their abuse. 

Professionals in society failed them. Social services, police, councils, politicians and so many more turned the other way and allowed this scandal to continue.

The inquiry needs to bring genuine justice to those poor girls.
attributes.background: Petition to instruct our Government to launch an impartial national inquiry into the rape gang scandal.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
